targets.expr: kube_pod_container_resource_requests{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"prometheus-gitlab-monitoring-promethe-prometheus-.*", container=~"$container", resource="memory", unit="byte"}

kube_pod_container_resource_limits{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"prometheus-gitlab-monitoring-promethe-prometheus-.*", container=~"$container", resource="memory", unit="byte"}

sum by (container) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"prometheus-gitlab-monitoring-promethe-prometheus-.*", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
/

sum by (container) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"prometheus-gitlab-monitoring-promethe-prometheus-.*", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description:
A time series is considered active if Prometheus scraped new data for it recently. Prometheus provides prometheus_tsdb_head_series metric, which shows the number of active time series. 

Prometheus holds recently added samples for active time series in RAM, so its RAM usage highly depends on the number of active time series.  

The number of active time series is connected to cardinality via churn rate
panels.title: Active time series

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (rate(prometheus_tsdb_compaction_chunk_size_bytes_sum{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", container="prometheus"}[1d]))
/
sum by (pod) (rate(prometheus_tsdb_compaction_chunk_samples_sum{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", container="prometheus"}[1d]))

panels.title: Average byte size of each sample ingested

panels.description:
prometheus_tsdb_head_samples_appended_total
The rate of this metric indicates the ingestion rate of every instance.
panels.title: Samples ingest/s

targets.expr: sum by (pod, slice) (rate(prometheus_engine_query_duration_seconds_count{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", container="prometheus",  job="gitlab-monitoring-promethe-prometheus", slice="inner_eval"}[$__rate_interval]))
